name: Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite
author: ModelTheme

sections.description:
Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite is the most compact and easy to use NFT Marketplace plugin, developed by one of bestselling premium WordPress theme/plugin authors, ModelTheme. The free version of the plugin comes prepackaged with features to start an NFT Marketplace in WordPress, in just a few minutes. The plugin supports multiple blockchains at the same time, multiple blockchain standards and it is fast as lightning.

VIDEO TUTORIALS

Visit the official ModelTheme YouTube channel here youâ€™ll find a comprehensive set of video tutorials dedicated to Enefti NFT Marketplace Core and all its features.

ENEFTI NFT MARKETPLACE (Features)

Enefti Lite:

  • Create NFTs (dashboard)
  • NFTs Post Type (Create NFTs from the dashboard and list them on the website NFTs Archive). The NFTs also has a single NFT Page
  • Shortcodes (Elementor and WPBakery): Owner Profile List, Recent Category, Collections Group
  • Owner author profiles
  • Track how many views an NFT has
  • Add the NFT to favourites
  • Import NFTs
  • Show NFTs in: Categories
  • Show NFTs in: Collections
  • Online Documentation
  • Multilingual
  • Compatible with any theme
  • Hooks for Developers
  • Voiced tutorials
  • Easy to use and manage
  • Multiple ways to earn money
  • NFT Single: A page displaying the NFT alongside itâ€™s details and price.
  • NFT Author: A page displaying the Author of the NFT and the NFTs he owns.
  • NFT Listings: A page with all the NFTs available on the website alongside filters and search.
  • and more…

Enefti Premium (Purchase on CodeCanyon)

NFT Owners/Artists/Sellers can:

  • Purchase NFTs.
  • Sell NFTs
  • Resale NFTs
  • Create NFTs
  • Import NFTs *
  • Mint NFTs **
  • Add the NFT to favourites.
  • Track how many views an NFT has.
  • Create collections.
  • Plan NFT releases
  • Sell multiple NFTs in one transaction
  • Make NFT purchasable for a custom period of time.
  • Edit NFT’s metadata

Contract:

  • Secure
  • Audited
  • Gas optimized
  • Fast
  • Easy to extend funcionality

Vendor Panel:

  • Manage all NFTs in one place: Edit, Delete, Update
  • Manage Collections: Edit, Update, Create
  • Manage NFT Contracts directly on the blockchain
  • Update NFT’s image location
  • Update royalties
  • Maximum mint number
  • And many more functions that the contract has.
  • Logout
  • Edit user information
  • Cover Image
  • Link Account With: MetaMask, WalletConnect
  • Social Links: Facebook, Youtube, Instagram

Integrations (Addons):

  • MetaMask Authenticator – Authenticate/Create Account/Link Existing Account with MetaMask inside WordPress.
  • WalletConnect Authenticator – Authenticate/Create Account/Link Existing Account with WalletConnect inside WordPress.
  • NFT Creator – Create NFTs directly inside WordPress (works without the NFT Marketplace Core).
  • Media Types For Enefti NFT Marketplace Core – Display a multitude of media types on your Marketplace.

Quality of Life:

  • Multi-Blockchain Solution (ANY EVM BLOCKCHAIN)
  • The NFTs are completly compliant with the MetaData standard. (meaning all your NFTs will show normall on any other dApp be it Wallets, other Markets or Games)
  • Sell NFTs on your website or/and let other users sell theirs/yours.
  • Add-ons Manager
  • Themes Manager
  • Autoupdates for all our purchased addons
  • License Manager
  • More than 8 Action Hooks
  • Online Documentation.
  • Multilingual (via Loco Translate or WPML)
  • Dark & Light Modes
  • Compatible with any theme
  • Hooks for Developers
  • Voiced tutorials
  • Easy to use and manage
  • Multiple ways to earn money
  • Plugin Settings for displaying what components go where and a lot more.

Marketplace Owners can:

  • Manage Marketplace Fees (a % of the nft’s value after sale).
  • Deploy contracts for someone else.
  • Deploy contracts on multiple blockchains.

Documentation & Support

  • Check out our step-by-step plugin documentation on how to install and use Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite.
  • You can also submit a topic to the support forum at and our support team will be glad to help you out.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 128 MB or greater

Installation

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Go to your WordPress Dashboard -> Plugins -> Add New
  2. Search for Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite
  3. Activate Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite from your Plugins page.
  4. Enjoy ðŸ™‚

From wordpress.org

  1. Download Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite.
  2. Upload the nft-marketplace-core-lite directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etcâ€¦)
  3. Activate Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite from your Plugins page.
  4. Enjoy ðŸ™‚
sections.faq:
How do I install Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite?

There are two ways you can install Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite plugin.

You can install the plugin from your WordPress dashboard:
1. Navigate to your WordPress Dashboard -> Plugins -> Add New
2. Search for Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite plugin
3. Install and Activate Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite from your Plugins page.

Or you can install it directly from WordPress.org
1. Locate and download Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite on wordpress.org
2. Upload the nft-marketplace-core-lite directory to your â€˜/wp-content/plugins/â€™ directory using your preferred method (ftp, sftp, scp, etcâ€¦)
3. Install and Activate Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite plugin from your Plugins page.

How do I get support?

If you require assistance while using the Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite plugin, you can visit the support forum on WordPress.org, or you can submit a ticket and our support agents will respond to you as soon as possible.

Do I need to know how to code?

Absolutely not. Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite was designed to allow you to create NFTs directly from the visual dashboard of your WordPress, without the need to understand or use any coding.

What if I update to the Premium version?

In the event that you decide to upgrade to the Premium version of Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite youâ€™ll get more than 40+ premium features to your NFT Marketplace, including: buy, sell, resell NFTs on multiple blockchains.

Does Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite plugin work with any WordPress theme?

Yes. Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite is designed to work with all WordPress themes, but our recommendation is the dedicated Enefti Theme.

What is the Enefti Theme and what is its connection to Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite plugin?

The Enefti Theme was developed by the same team that built Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite and it comes with 10+ NFT Related website demos. While Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite work with any theme, you will certainly get the most out of the plugin when using it together with the Enefti Theme, as the plugin was primarily developed to work best with it.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 – 04-01-2023

  • Fixed the issue with “NFT Marketplace Core is on production environment with missing composer dumpautoload -o that will improve the performance on autoloading itself.”

1.0 – 05-12-2022

  • Initial release.

short_description: Enefti NFT Marketplace Core lite is a starting point for NFT Marketplaces based on Wordpress. Creating NFTs was never so easy.
